manifestDuplicated.description: Report message when there are more than one manifest
manifestDuplicated.message: 'manifest' link element is not needed as one was already specified.

manifestNonEmptyHref.description: Report message when the manifest has an empty href attribute
manifestNonEmptyHref.message: 'manifest' link element should have non-empty 'href' attribute.

manifestNotSpecified.description: Report message when the manifest link element is not specified
